titles.title: National Institute of Standards and Technology Industrial Technology Services Authorization Act of 1995
To authorize appropriations for the National Institute of Standards and Technology Industrial Technology Services for fiscal year 1996, and for other purposes.

action.text: Hearings Held by the Subcommittee on Technology Prior to Introduction.
Consideration and Mark-up Session Held by the Subcommittee on Technology Prior to Introduction.
Referred to the House Committee on Science.

bill.summary: 6/16/1995--Introduced. National Institute of Standards and Technology Industrial Technology Services Authorization Act of 1995 - Authorizes appropriations for the National Institute of Standards and Technology Industrial Technology Services (Department of Commerce).
